metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugins collection: clipboard hooks, GitButler auto-commit, and more

plugins.name: copy-last-message
plugins.description: Copies the last assistant message to clipboard when a Claude Code session stops

plugins.name: ccbut-auto-commit
plugins.description: Auto-commits changes via GitButler (but command) when a Claude Code session stops

plugins.name: gogcli
plugins.description: Google Workspace CLI (gogcli) skills for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, and Tasks operations

plugins.name: agent-browser
plugins.description: Browser automation with agent-browser CLI - AI-first design with CDP support for authenticated sessions

plugins.name: python-oneshot-script
plugins.description: PEP 723インラインメタデータを使ったPython単発スクリプトの書き方ガイドライン

plugins.name: mcpc
plugins.description: MCP tools via Unix pipes with mcpc CLI - bypass LLM context for file-based input and large output filtering

plugins.name: ntfy-claude-runner
plugins.description: Event-driven Claude Code execution via ntfy.sh notifications and Zellij terminal panes

plugins.name: youtube-research
plugins.description: YouTube動画のリサーチ・字幕取得・要約プラグイン（yt-dlp検索・youtube-transcript-api字幕取得）

plugins.name: superwhisper-transcribe
plugins.description: SuperWhisperを使った音声ファイルの文字起こし（CLIからファイルを渡してテキスト取得）

plugins.name: x-browser
plugins.description: X/Twitterの情報取得スキル - agent-browser経由で検索・Grokリサーチ・タイムライン読み取り

plugins.name: knowledge-pathfinder
plugins.description: Create optimized documentation reference commands using modern standards (llms.txt, sitemap.xml) and category-specific strategies for 90-100% URL coverage without crawling services

plugins.name: custom-code-review
plugins.description: Multi-perspective code review plugin with 39 specialized review angles - security, correctness, design, testing, and more. 5 review modes from quick to thorough with parallel agent execution
